mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Tyler, Robert, 1816-1877
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Relays an editorial written in the Pennsylvanian "hinting the idea of coalition"; relays, Autograph Letter Signedo, good tidings from Mr. Buchanan; asks if Wise knows James Black of Pittsburg; mentions [William] Bigler; warns that a split may occur in the Democratic Party. Autograph Letter Signed Printed in Auchampaugh
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Letter, 1856 April 26, Robert Tyler, Philadelphia, Pennsylvania to Governor Henry A. Wise
